attributes.action: Government to prohibit any exams from taking place during the Covid-19 outbreak
attributes.background: No exams should be taking place in 2021. Although GCSEs and A Levels have been cancelled, other exams such as Pre-U exams have not yet been cancelled. This is extremely unfair for those students still forced to take exams when they have lost so much time in school due to the pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570228
